translation.it: Ecco qua. Un po' per me.

translation.en: -There we go. Thank you. [chuckles] -A lot for Don.
Little bit of whiskey for Jaden there. There you go.
translation.it: E un pochino di whisky per Jaden. Ecco qua.

translation.en: All right. A toast. To past victories and future success.
translation.it: Ora brindiamo. Alle vittorie passate e ai futuri successi.

translation.en: To fathers and sons. And to that big old non-typical!
translation.it: Ai padri e ai figli. A quel cervo atipico!

translation.en: That burns more than scotch.
When have you ever had scotch?
Greg let me have a sip.
translation.it: Me lo ha fatto provare Greg.

translation.en: I like my whiskey American. Just like my cheese.
translation.it: Io preferisco il whisky americano. Come il formaggio.

translation.en: In all my world travels, I've had Swiss cheese, French Brie cheese,
translation.it: Nei miei tanti viaggi ho provato il formaggio svizzero, il brie francese,

translation.en: every kind of cheese you can name.
And I like processed American slices the best.
translation.it: ma nessuno è come le sottilette americane.

translation.en: Kraft cheese melts the best. That's why I like it.
translation.it: Le Kraft che si sciolgono sono le migliori.

translation.en: I'm just not one who thinks it's better 'cause it's foreign.
translation.it: Solo perché una cosa è straniera, non è detto che sia migliore.

translation.en: -Could I have some more? -Look out.
Jaden got himself a taste for the whiskey.
Just a little bit, though. Just a little.
-You, too, Don? -Whoo-hoo!
[Don] He ain't gonna outdrink me.
translation.it: Non posso bere meno di lui.

translation.en: All right. Here we go. One, two, three.
Okay.
Damn. That was awesome. That was beautiful.
What'd you think?
It's good. I had trouble following the story of the song,
translation.it: È stato fantastico. Non sono riuscito a seguirne la trama,

translation.en: but it was good. It was good. [chuckles]
-How long you been playing for? -Two years.
Two years. Wow, I had no idea.
-[cell phone ringing] -Ah, hold up.
-It's Caroline. Dang. Hold on. -[Don chuckles]
-[Buck] Everything all right? -It's fine.
[Buck] Tell me about this girl you're dating.
translation.it: Parlarmi un po' di questa ragazza.

translation.en: -You go to the same school? -No. She's already in middle school.
translation.it: - Frequentate la stessa scuola? - No, lei è già alle medie.

translation.en: Oh, middle school. Uh-oh, look out. Jaden's got himself an older woman.
translation.it: Alle medie. Caspita. Jaden esce con una più grande.

translation.en: No. Jaden got held back a year.
It's nothing to be ashamed of, right, son? It's all good.
Did I tell you I got a girlfriend?
translation.it: Ho già detto che anch'io ho una ragazza?

translation.en: Yes, I do. Her name's Kimberly.
I got a photograph of her here.
There she is. Ninety-eight pounds.
I call her my little spinner. Wanna know why?
translation.it: La chiamo trottolina. Vuoi sapere perché?

translation.en: Why?
Because I set her up on the tip of my pecker
translation.it: Perché, quando è sul mio palo,

translation.en: and spin her around like a spinning top.
translation.it: la faccio girare come una trottola.

translation.en: All right, Don. That's enough. [laughing]
Oh, God, love her. [laughs]
After this trip, me and her are gonna visit her folks in Kentucky. Phew.
translation.it: Dopo questo viaggio, andremo a trovare i suoi in Kentucky.

translation.en: They got it figured out. They got this beautiful land.
translation.it: Hanno una vita perfetta. Un terreno straordinario.

translation.en: Great big farm. All they do is sit around watching TV. [scoffs]
translation.it: Una bellissima fattoria. E non fanno che guardare la TV.

translation.en: Don't they have a farm to run?
I guess. I ain't never seen them do it, though.
translation.it: Forse, ma non li ho mai visti farlo.

translation.en: All I see them do is watch television.
translation.it: Io li vedo solo guardare la TV.

translation.en: That is gangster.
Sounds kind of boring to me.
[chuckling] Me and Kimberly like it, so it's not that boring to me.
translation.it: A me e Kimberly piace. Io non lo trovo così noioso.

translation.en: How about you, Dad? You got a girlfriend?
translation.it: E tu, papà? Hai una ragazza?

translation.en: Who, Buck? The only tail your dad is chasing is whitetail.
translation.it: Chi? Buck? Lui pensa solo ai cervi.

translation.en: [Buck chuckles] Yeah. That's right.
Maybe you should start dating again.
No, no, no. I'm all right as is. I'm doing just fine.
Probably be good for you.
Seems like Mom is moving on. Her and Greg are talking about getting married.
translation.it: La mamma ha voltato pagina. Lei e Greg parlano di matrimonio.

translation.en: They're talking about what?
He hasn't officially asked her yet, but she knows it's coming.
translation.it: Non gliel'ha ancora chiesto ufficialmente, ma lei se lo aspetta.

translation.en: They talk about it all the time.
Shoot. That's ridiculous.
The ink on the divorce is barely even dry.
[chuckles] It has been two years, Buck.
What are you, a human calendar?
Mr. Trapper Keeper? I know how long it's been.
translation.it: Un'agenda vivente? So quanto è passato.

translation.en: God! Shoot. I hate selfish people!
[Jaden] I'll give it to him, though.
Greg told me some of his ideas for when he proposes.
translation.it: Greg mi ha esposto alcune sue idee per la proposta

translation.en: Man, that dude has a great imagination.
translation.it: e devo dire che ha tanta immaginazione.

translation.en: He was talking about all these crazy things like skydiving.
translation.it: Ha parlato di skydiving e roba simile.

translation.en: Where you going?
I'm gonna go take a leak.
Dang.
What were you thinking?
translation.it: Cosa ti è venuto in mente?

translation.en: You know better than to pull a stunt like this.
You could have hurt yourself.
Sorry. Dang!
What is going on in your mind?
I just wanted to ride and y'all were asleep.
translation.it: Volevo solo fare un giro e voi dormivate.

translation.en: You realize I have to pay for that four-wheeler now?
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che ora dovrò pagare quel quad?

translation.en: -You realize how much they cost? -[sighs]
[Buck] Why are you recording?
This isn't part of the narrative.
I figured it might make a good mid-point crisis--
translation.it: Poteva rappresentare una bella crisi di metà viaggio...

translation.en: Shut the camera off.
Trying to have a moment with my son. Remove yourself.
translation.it: Mi sto confrontando con mio figlio. Vattene.

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
[sighs] This sucks. If you let me drive, then we wouldn't be in this predicament.
translation.it: Se mi avessi lasciato guidare, non sarebbe successo.

translation.en: You shouldn't have taken out the four-wheeler without permission.
translation.it: Non avresti dovuto prendere il quad senza permesso.

translation.en: Fine. I'm the devil. I'm a terrible person.
translation.it: E va bene. Sono il diavolo. Sono una persona orribile.

translation.en: -Who are you calling? -Nobody.
Dang, I'm making a video for my vlog.
translation.it: Giro un video per il mio vlog.

translation.en: What's up? This is Jaden running around here,
translation.it: Come va? Sono Jaden e sono in questi boschi

translation.en: hunting in the woods with my dad.
Sucks.
Leave me some comments if you hate hunting, too.
translation.it: Lasciate dei commenti se anche voi odiate la caccia.

translation.en: Give it.
What are you doing?
I told you one too many times to stay off the phone.
translation.it: Sei sempre attaccato a questo telefono.

translation.en: But that's my private property.
I'm keeping this until the end of the trip.
translation.it: Lo terrò io fino alla fine del viaggio.

translation.en: For the next few days, you have to go without it.
translation.it: I prossimi giorni te la caverai senza.

translation.en: What about Caroline?
The world isn't gonna end if you can't call your girlfriend for three days.
translation.it: Il mondo non finirà se non potrai chiamare la tua ragazza per tre giorni.

translation.en: But we're each other's support system.
translation.it: Ma noi ci sosteniamo a vicenda.

translation.en: The cell phone is mine. Topic closed.
translation.it: Il cellulare lo tengo io. Punto.

translation.en: You're ruining my life and you don't even care.
translation.it: Mi stai rovinando la vita e neanche ti importa.

translation.en: Maybe I'm ruining your life 'cause you're being a damn idiot.
translation.it: Forse lo faccio perché tu ti comporti da idiota.

translation.en: Don't call me an idiot!
-Okay. -Take it back.
I take it back. It's not like I meant it.
translation.it: Me lo rimangio. Non dicevo sul serio.

translation.en: Let's forget about it.
Now what about that non-typical we saw yesterday?
translation.it: Pensiamo al cervo atipico che abbiamo visto ieri.

translation.en: How'd you like to bag that son of a gun, huh?
Come on, we're hunting. Let's have fun.
translation.it: Avanti. Siamo qui per cacciare. Divertiamoci.

translation.en: I can't stand you sometimes.
[Buck] I see you peeking out from behind that tree.
translation.it: Ti vedo mentre ci riprendi da là dietro.

translation.en: This is not going in the cut.
After experiencing some technical difficulties
with one of our four-wheelers,
we decided to go on foot.
Nothing was gonna keep Jaden and me from catching that monster non-typical.
translation.it: Niente impedirà a me e Jaden di cacciare quel cervo atipico.

translation.en: When things don't go right, a true hunter straps on his boots and marches on.
translation.it: Quando le cose non vanno bene, un cacciatore tiene duro e va avanti.

translation.en: Just when we thought we'd lost the trail,
translation.it: Pensavamo di aver perso le sue tracce,

translation.en: I noticed a whole mess of tracks by the river.
translation.it: ma ne ho notate diverse vicino al fiume.

translation.en: This was a good sign.
It looked like a well-traveled doe trail, and like every hunter knows,
translation.it: Sembrano tracce di un cervo femmina e ogni bravo cacciatore sa

translation.en: where there's a doe, a buck is not far behind.
translation.it: che dove c'è un cervo femmina c'è un cervo maschio.

translation.en: I showed Jaden how the doe trail followed up the river.
translation.it: Ho mostrato a Jaden come le tracce seguivano il fiume.

translation.en: Our non-typical was leading us even deeper into the mountains,
translation.it: Il nostro cervo atipico ci fa addentrare tra le montagne,

translation.en: miles away from human contact.
Almost as if it was calling us.
translation.it: Quasi come se ci stesse chiamando.

translation.en: Just like life, hunting comes with no guarantees.
translation.it: Come la vita, anche la caccia non ha garanzie.

translation.en: But I don't usually have a problem finding the big deer,
translation.it: Ma io riesco quasi sempre a trovare il grande cervo,

translation.en: especially with that old Sniper 2000 stuff I use.
translation.it: soprattutto quando uso il vecchio Sniper 2000.

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
It's like he doesn't even care about catching this deer.
translation.it: È come se non gli importasse di cacciare quel cervo.

translation.en: This trip was supposed to be a way for us to bond.
translation.it: Questo viaggio dovrebbe creare un legame fra noi.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it doesn't look like that's happening.
translation.it: Non mi pare che sia così.

translation.en: -Jesus, Don. -What? I'm agreeing with you.
translation.it: - Cristo, Don. - Che c'è? Ti sto dando ragione.

translation.en: It doesn't look like it's happening.
translation.it: Non mi pare che sia così.

translation.en: -Yeah, well, stop. -Okay. Copy that.
I was hoping to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.
translation.it: Vorrei parlarti di una cosa, se non ti dispiace.

translation.en: Yeah, what?
Well, I was thinking maybe after this trip I go ahead and take a little time off.
translation.it: Pensavo, dopo questo viaggio, di prendermi una pausa.

translation.en: What? Time off?
Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.it: Sì. Ti ho parlato della fattoria dei genitori di Kimberly.

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.it: e passare là un po' di tempo per vedere se ci troviamo bene.

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
translation.it: Ma il mese prossimo abbiamo Washington.

translation.en: That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.it: Pensavo che potresti andarci da solo. Io mi chiamo fuori.

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
translation.it: Ma dobbiamo girare Buck Ferguson conquista il Nordovest.

translation.en: Well, Buck, to be honest,
Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.it: Kimberly non sopporta più tutte le mie assenze.

translation.en: She's throwing around the "R" word.
translation.it: Ha tirato in ballo la parola con la "P".

translation.en: What's that word?
Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
translation.it: Pensione. Vuole che vada in pensione.

translation.en: I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up.
translation.it: E me ne parli proprio ora?

translation.en: Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.it: Ho già i miei problemi con Jaden...

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do. [chuckles]
Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.it: Ascolta. Tu e io abbiamo fatto cose epocali.

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.it: Cioè, io le ho fatte e tu le hai riprese.

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
translation.it: No, Buck. Non ho detto questo, ma...

translation.en: This isn't really that thought out of an idea.
translation.it: Non ci ho ancora riflettuto bene.

translation.en: It was just something she was pushing on me.
translation.it: Me lo ha solo proposto lei.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
translation.it: Mi spiace, ma non posso permetterlo.

translation.en: Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.it: Il tuo sogno di guardare la TV tutto il giorno dovrà aspettare.

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
Yeah. No. Of course you do.
We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.it: Magari ne riparliamo più in là.

translation.en: -How about that? -Yeah. I don't know, Don.
translation.it: - Che ne dici? - Non saprei, Don.

translation.en: Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
translation.it: Magari tra un annetto. O forse no.

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.it: Mi sta bene. Dimentica tutto quanto.

translation.en: [Don] Hey, look what I found.
Keep moving.
Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
translation.it: Attento o rischi di farti male.

translation.en: I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.it: No, sono allenato. Greg mi ha mandato a lezione di parkour.

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
translation.it: Non fai karate? Avevamo deciso per il karate.

translation.en: It was too hard, so I quit.
translation.it: Era troppo difficile e ho mollato.

translation.en: Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.it: Non puoi mollare se le cose si fanno difficili.

translation.en: [Jaden] That's not what Greg says.
Greg says if you don't like doing something,
translation.it: Dice che se non ti piace fare una cosa

translation.en: there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.it: non devi farla e che va bene mollare.

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
translation.it: È un pessimo consiglio. Ora capisco perché hai perso un anno.

translation.en: Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
translation.it: Greg dice che è colpa dell'insegnante.

translation.en: Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear
translation.it: Dice quello che vuoi sentirti dire

translation.en: because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
translation.it: Fidati. Quando sarai un po' più grande,

translation.en: you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
translation.it: non troverai la ginnastica così fica.

translation.en: I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
Oh, you're okay.
No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
translation.it: No, invece. Mi fa male la gamba.

translation.en: That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
translation.it: Lo dicevo di non correre tra quelle rocce. Alzati.

translation.en: Let me catch my breath for a second.
-Is your leg hurting or are you tired? -Both. Dang.
translation.it: - Ti fa male la gamba o sei stanco? - Entrambe le cose. Accidenti.

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
translation.it: Abbiamo già perso tutta la mattina.

translation.en: -Daylight's burning here. -But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.it: - Stiamo sprecando la luce. - Ma mi fa malissimo la gamba.

translation.en: [Don] Oh, you shit bird!
[Buck] You all right, Don?
[sighs] I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
translation.it: Sono scivolato e ho battuto la testa.

translation.en: Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
translation.it: Forse è meglio fermarsi per pranzo.

translation.en: Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.it: Sì. Accampiamoci. Sembra una buona idea.

translation.en: Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
translation.it: Bene. Ho un calo di zuccheri.

translation.en: Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
-Making sandwiches. -You ain't hungry?
translation.it: - Sta preparando dei panini. - Non hai fame?

translation.en: I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
translation.it: Sì, ma trasferirò quella sofferenza nella mia musica.

translation.en: Oh, uh-oh. What's wrong?
I could tell you, but you would never understand.
Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.it: Ti sorprenderebbe sapere ciò che il vecchio Don può capire.

translation.en: -[lighter clicks] -You smoke?
Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
translation.it: Sì. Ma non dirlo a tuo padre.

translation.en: Thinks it scares away the deer.
Can I get a toke?
There you go, Biggin.
I wish my dad was more chill like you.
translation.it: Vorrei che mio padre fosse tranquillo come te.

translation.en: Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.it: Non è uno con cui è facile andare d'accordo.

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.it: Credo sia perché vuole diventare il miglior cacciatore del mondo.

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.it: Ricordo il primo video che girai con lui.

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
translation.it: Eravamo in Michigan e non ero preparato per quel clima.

translation.en: That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.it: Il primo giorno sono caduti 25 cm di neve e non avevo gli stivali impermeabili.

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
"Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here."
translation.it: "Ti prego, Buck. Torniamo indietro. Andiamocene a casa".

translation.en: But he wasn't hearing it.
He sat me down. He was like,
translation.it: Mi ha fatto sedere e ha risposto:

translation.en: "Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.it: "Don, sai a quale pressione sono sottoposto?

translation.en: Every single person thinks
that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time,
translation.it: che io riesca a cacciare un cervo ogni volta

translation.en: and I won't turn back until I do."
translation.it: e non tornerò a casa senza preda".

translation.en: -What'd you do? -What do you think I did?
translation.it: - E tu che hai fatto? - Secondo te?

translation.en: Sucked it up.
We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.it: Siamo rimasti là altri tre giorni e tuo padre aveva ragione.

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
translation.it: Ha sparato a un bel cervo

translation.en: and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
translation.it: e abbiamo girato uno dei nostri video migliori.

translation.en: What about your feet?
I lost my big toe to frostbite.
You lost a toe?
Yes, I did. Yep.
Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.it: Mi dà qualche problema di equilibrio.

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway.
translation.it: Ma non è quella la morale.

translation.en: The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.it: Il punto è che tuo padre è sottoposto a moltissima pressione.

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
translation.it: Tu sai cosa si prova, vero?

translation.en: I guess.
Don, why does my dad hate me?
translation.it: Don, perché mio padre mi odia?

translation.en: Hate you?
Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.it: So che è dura andare d'accordo con lui, ma ti vuole bene.

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
That divorce did a real number on his head.
I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.it: Spera con questo viaggio di sistemare le cose.

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
translation.it: Vorrei pensasse meno all'idea di farmi uccidere un cervo

translation.en: and more about giving me back my dang phone.
translation.it: e che si decidesse a ridarmi il telefono.

translation.en: Caroline's probably worried sick.
I can relate to that.
If I don't call Kimberly every now and then,
translation.it: Se ogni tanto non chiamo Kimberly,

translation.en: she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse. [chuckles]
translation.it: finisco nella cacca fino al collo.

translation.en: I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.it: Vorrei ci fosse un modo per farle sapere che sto bene.

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
-You ready, buddy? -[Jaden] I'm ready.
-Are you filming? Is it rolling? -Yeah.
Here we go. Hoverboard city.
-[Jaden] Don't be scared. -I ain't scared.
translation.it: - Non avere paura. - Non ho paura.

translation.en: Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.it: Non voglio rompermi l'osso del collo. Grazie del giro!

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.it: Cerco la via più breve per raggiungere la cima della montagna.

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
translation.it: Il pranzo si raffredda. Dov'è Jaden?

translation.en: Don, look at me. Where's my son?
[clears throat] He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
translation.it: Sta parlando con la sua ragazza.

translation.en: No, he's not. I took his phone away.
translation.it: Impossibile. Gli ho tolto il telefono.

translation.en: I let him borrow mine. So he's...
translation.it: Gli ho prestato il mio. Sta...

translation.en: -You did what? -I let him borrow my phone.
translation.it: - Cos'hai fatto? - Gli ho prestato il mio.

translation.en: It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.it: Era la cosa giusta. Voleva parlarle.

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip.
translation.it: Gli avevo tolto il suo perché si concentrasse sulla gita.

translation.en: How could you do that?
I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
translation.it: Forse è perché credo nel vero amore.

translation.en: He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
translation.it: A lui piace tanto quella ragazza e non mi sembrava giusto...

translation.en: Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
translation.it: Don! Smettila. Io sono suo padre.

translation.en: I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly
translation.it: So cos'è meglio per lui e vorrei

translation.en: if you would not undercut my authority again.
translation.it: che tu non sminuissi più la mia autorità.

translation.en: Copy that.
Nothing is going the way it's supposed to.
I cooked this nice meal.
The whole thing's gonna go to waste, just like this trip.
translation.it: E andrà sprecato, come questo viaggio.

translation.en: And now, I get to go be the bad guy again.
translation.it: Dovrò di nuovo fare la parte del cattivo.

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Don.
What did I tell you, son?
No phone calls until after this trip and you disobeyed me.
translation.it: Niente telefonate fino a fine viaggio e mi hai disobbedito.

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation.it: Cos'hai da dire a tua discolpa?

translation.en: Caroline broke up with me.
What happened?
She went to this middle school dance,
translation.it: È andata al ballo delle medie,

translation.en: which everyone knows is a recipe for disaster.
